enWisdom: Remembrance is being in the company of the beloved
Remembering [Allah] is the key to intimacy [and nearness with Him]
The remembrance [of Allah] is the delight of the lovers
The one who remembers Allah is His intimate friend
The one who remembers Allah is in His Company

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ قُوتُ النُّفُوسِ وَمُجَالَسَةُ الْمَحْبُوبِ
enWisdom: The remembrance of Allah is nourishment for the souls and [being in] the company of the [most] Beloved

Wisdom: ذِكْرُ اللَّهِ مَسَرَّةُ كُلِّ مُتَّقٍ وَلَذَّةُ كُلِّ مُوقِنٍ
enWisdom: Remembrance of Allah is the joy of every God-wary person and the delight of every possessor of certitude
